drupalNodeEvent.title: China, Hong Kong, and the Future of Freedom: A Dialogue Between Hoover Institution Director Condoleezza Rice and Lord Chris Patten

field_description.processed: You are cordially invited to a special event marking the launch of the Hoover Institution's new project on China's Global Sharp Power. Hoover Institution Director Condoleezza Rice and Lord Chris Patten will engage in a wide-ranging discussion about China's deepening authoritarianism, its escalating assault on Hong Kong's freedom and way of life, and the challenge that China's intensifying assertion of "sharp power" poses to democracies worldwide.
